text:
University of Twente (Dutch: "Universiteit Twente"), shortened to UT, is a public university in Enschede, a city in the province of Overijssel, the Netherlands.
The University of Twente was established in 1961.
It was called "Technical College of Twente" (Dutch: "Technische Hogeschool Twente") until 1986.
Its focus is on technology and social sciences.
